website_summaries.verdict: Observe maneuvers with included mirror monitor with on-screen distance scale lines. An excellent, easy-to-use choice.
pros: Heavy-duty, marine grade construction is highly durable
and the whole system is easy to install
We love the included rearview mirror monitor that allows you to easily keep an eye on what's behind you
Automatically activates when put in reverse gear
cons: Some users find the included cables to be slightly short

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit
customer_reviews.text: LCD flickers on and off while reversing. Checked every plug and seems to have good connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonguru

customer_reviews.title: The wiring in this kit fit my truck like it was made for it
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this on my 2005 Ram 1500 4dr 6ft bed. The wiring in this kit fit my truck like it was made for it. The whole installation took less than 3hrs including a visit from a few friends. All I can say is WOW. Works like a charm. Can't believe such a nice product can be bought for only $69.99 Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Someone needs to use a tape measure
customer_reviews.text: I have this system installed and ran cables as straight as possible along with running mirror and power wires down to back of glove box so to be able to use video cable that came with it, but unfortunately it is still two feet to short. Also the camera mount covers up stickers attached to license plate which is highly illegal in any state. Not real happy with installation set up. I did not see anywhere in the specs the length of video cable because I would have measured to make sure it was long enough. Now I have go buy more cable to finish installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but mine died :-/
customer_reviews.text: ugh... put a lot of effort in wiring everything up. Worked really well until a day ago. Rear view mirror stopped working. Used external monitor to verify camera still works... amazon won't let me return.
customer_reviews.author: E.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal but mirror is shaky!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of recearch on what backup camera I was going to purchase. I kept looking into this deal, and I took the plung. When I first received the mirror kit I was pleasantly suprised, it's high quality. I installed it on my Nissan Sedan without any issues and it looks great. Everything works good and the screen is hidden really well being the mirror, when I'm driving I can't even tell that there is a screen there. However, the only reason I gave this 2 stars is because when driving the glass mirror price vibrates a ton to where you can't tell what is behind you, aslo it sounds like a screw is loose inside.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C. Cable

customer_reviews.title: Picture got cloudy even after cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: The width of the parking lines is not adjustable for larger vehicles which may give you a false sense of security regarding how close you are to objects next to you. Also the camera got cloudy just after the warranty date.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Install was easy. The concept is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a hard one to write. Install was easy. The concept is great. However, the image blinks off and on. I replaced the rear camera, homed out the AV cable, and double checked the power connection but still no fix. So, it must be in the rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for an experienced DIYer.  Would be a challenge for a novice diyer.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy installation on 2005 Jeep Liberty. Since license plate bracket is not centered on this model, I ended up mounting to center of bumper cover, below tail gate mounted spare tire.. Would have been easier if unit setup included a setup menu to flip the camera image, but that was a minor inconvenience. Quality of image in mirror screen is great. Image pops up instantly when vehicle is shifted into reverse. No hesitation. Mirror is dlightly larger than factory mirror, so sun visors make contact with mirror when visors are pulled down.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy J. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Good product (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Like that it replaces the factory mirror. Installed on 2012 Silverado 1500. Installed video cable through front bulkhead (did not want to go through floor grommet). Connected camera via t-taps to backup light wires. Connected monitor via fuse tap to fuse in engine compartment. This connection only delivers power to the monitor when in reverse. This is fine if you only have the one camera installed. Found out through previous experience that the monitor if continuosly on will draw your battery down if you don't drive much. The connection I described above avoids that battery draw-down. Overall, pleased with the unit (so far).
customer_reviews.author: CSmith

customer_reviews.title: This is every bit as nice as you would hope.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my minivan needed. Fits and looks like it is oem. It's much brighter than I expected but that's a good thing. The resolution is great as well. The only bad things I have to say about it is that here are no instructions and the green led that indicates that it has power is always lit.
customer_reviews.author: Frankinstyn

customer_reviews.title: State compliance
customer_reviews.text: Camera strip covers verbiage on the license plate, thus making a probability of being stopped by a cop. I had to buy another camera, kept the mirror. I’ll revisit review at a later date. Oh, Pa is the State of Residency and plate is Non-vanity state issue. Update: The quality is exceptional for the price. I drive an SUV and I know how to parallel park, however, too many blind spots when parking in front of a smaller car. All things considered, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Basic backup camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the lines that show up, even though they aren't exact. I don't like that it doesn't auto tint, sometimes on sunny days I can't see the camera because it is washed out by the light. I would probably go for something more expensive that has the feature. Also, the green light showing that it is on is really bright, I had to cover it with electrical tape. It was distracting at night. I would recommend this if you need to go cheap, but it's not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not very details. I am very upset. It took me more than days to installing and a lot researching how to install probably and extra $$ to spent for relay, more wires. And only get a chance to use one day just one freaking day and it's stopped working again. Seriously!!! Please at least give more details how to install. What is need to some vehicles. I give up fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Bik

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition to the Honda Accord
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was a great addition to the 07 honda accord, the only downfall I can say is the mirror has a tiny to it, so having tinted windows and looking through a tinted mirror is s negative. The installation was easy, basic plug and play. I am a little meticulous when it comes to appearance so I over did the tucking and concealing of the wiring. The license plate on my vehicle is on the trunk lid, so I had to extend my power connectors to the backup lihhts.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Second one I installed and still love it
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to installing this in a professional way in my 2013 Nissan Altima and the install itself was easy. I did this a bit more professionally using fuseblock taps from Amazon and no cut/no strip taps for the rear backup light. VERY EASY. The longest part of this was removing the trim pieces and running the wire in a hidden way so that it looks and feels like a pro job. I love this Pyle backup camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: great price and it works
customer_reviews.text: great price does exactly what i needed. I have a long driveway about 200 feet that has a very dark spot in the middle and if someone is parked there you can tell the driveway just looks wide open. with this camera as soon as i put my truck in reverse i can see clearly at night all the way down my driveway. Also it came with just enough wire to install it on my 2009 standard cab silverado 1500. I just bought another one for my daughters car
customer_reviews.author: Nickscar

customer_reviews.title: DONT Last long!
customer_reviews.text: The first camera I am talking about the camera itself at the back of the vehicle lasted 2 weeks and Amazon replaced it for free. The second one lasted 1.5 years until the water got in and they will not replace it for free anymore! Other than that I like it yet I expected more years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: roland kovalenoks

customer_reviews.title: Pleased costomer.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on an F-350 4 x 4 crew cab several months ago. Great picture quality. Held up under multiple car washes & rain. Be sure you know what side your fuse box is on. My box is on passenger side. You want to be sure cable is long enough for direct hook up to box. The cable was long enough on my truck without allot much to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Chinese product that isn't worth the money. Picture is very grainy sort of like watching TV with old style rabbit ears antenna. The picture also blinks on and off occasionally. The camera was missing one of the set screws you use to adjust the angle. Camera also blocks tbe state name on top of the license plate making it illegal in most states. I recommend you do not buy and look elsewhere for something of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: WORKED FANTASTIC. My fancy radio died so I lost my ...
customer_reviews.text: WORKED FANTASTIC. My fancy radio died so I lost my backup camera. I ordered the mirror and put my factory radio back in. The mirror worked great! I had a camera in the ford emblem already. So I mounted your camera on top of shell on my truck (contractors tool shell, no windows) so now I have rearview camera while driving, and switches to back up camera for backing and seeing my trailer hitch. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: William Dolton

customer_reviews.title: Almost like not having a camera at all
customer_reviews.text: This setup is horrible! 1. In the day time the image is dark, at night the image is very washed out. 2. the mirror shakes so much almost makes you sick if you are looking in it. 3. the green light is so bright you have to cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: matt king

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as desired
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work okay. camera is not the greatest and little adjustment is available leading to minor distortion, but given the price, it is fine. It serves the purpose of providing a view while backing. this is why I wanted to add it the vehicle. As to installation, I can't comment. I took it to Best Buy and it took about an hour and a half to complete. Overall, quite pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He was happy with the product but after only a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for use on his truck while trailering his boat. He was happy with the product but after only a few days the camera quit working. He called Pyle and they told him to mail it in. He did so and is having trouble getting any satisfaction from them so far. I am disappointed also because this was a gift and he is rather frustrated with it. If it worked right, it would be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It is well worth the few extra dollars to get a better quality camera and mirror
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked first time unlike a couple of the cheaper Chinese made cameras that I tried before buying this one. It is well worth the few extra dollars to get a better quality camera and mirror.
customer_reviews.author: AllenM

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Brought product, installed, it worked for about an hour, then stopped working. brought another and systematically swapped out parts to see what was broken, started working after camera replaced, this time only worked for a few minutes. Clearly a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Wireless feature unreliable, spotty at best.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor built into the rearview mirror is the greatest feature by far. The new mirror slid into existing windscreen mount on my 2017 JK which made for a really clean / factory look. Because the camera is a license plate mount, and my Jeep has an off-set plate holder, I cut the bracket down, tap and drilled into center of rear bumper just above trailer hitch and below spare. Concealed nicely in that spot and has a good field of vision. After several episodes of ghosting, no picture at all, static/fuzzy picture and on/off interference, I opted to hardwire the video to monitor with the supplied wiring and so far it seems 100%.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: I love this backup camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this backup camera. It provides a crisp and colorful picture. It took a while to install: The written instructions were very small, and I needed a magnifying glass to read them; the diagram was fine. Also, the camera was installed upside down in the housing, but it was fairly easy turn the housing/camera around.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to utilize the rear view mirror only as I installed a different camera on the tailgate of my Tundra. The value this kit offers is great. The picture is awesome and you do not notice the monitor when the monitor is in the off position. When my camera flips on, it automatically displays the image without any delay. The only thing that bothers me a little is the green indicator light as it is quite bright. At night, it bothers me a little at first, but I get used to it rather quickly. Just something to be aware of if you are considering the purchase. 5 Stars for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and basic in appearance
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with quality. I was confused with witch wires to connect and what not to connect. Some information not included in instructions. Generally a class act. I waited too long to install. The image in the mirror is way too dim to see in daylight. Ok at night. I recommend a different product now that I have installed. I bought another brand for less money and it was easier to install and had a front camera also. It also recorded front and rear cameras too.
customer_reviews.author: David  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dimm picture
customer_reviews.text: The installation went well. It took me three hours and all the parts worked together well. However I can't see the picture unless it is dark. The picture is very dim when it is bright outside because the glare reflects on the mirror. The monitor needs to be brighter against the reflected light from the back.
customer_reviews.author: vechung

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I currently own a 2002 Chevy Silverado, after owning a 2012 Tacoma. The Toyota had all the bells and whistles including a back-up camera and my Silverado did not and I wanted one, bad. So for Christmas I asked my wife for this camera because it was just like what I had in the Tacoma, and I got it. It was very easy to install -it only took me about two and a half hours. The picture looks great and actually has more features than the one in the Tacoma. I am very pleased and excited that my truck now has this feature!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi L. Commander

customer_reviews.title: Great camera system. I’ve bought 4 systems in total, great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th back up camera system I have purchased and installed in our work vans. I prefer a different camera because the license plate is on the back door and not centered in the bumper so its off center. For $16 I get the Pyle flush mount camera and place it directly over the trailer ball. It’s like cheating but it’s not!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Peckenpaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice product, my only issue with it it's the fact the the instructions are crap and are very vague. And when I called the company for assistance the only said, I'm sorry for the instructions here is a video on how to install it. I thought that would be helpful...... Except the video want of the product, it was a random YouTube person installing something completely different. Not happy with this purchase and I don't recommend it to anyone that doesn't have a background in vehicle wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just installed tonight, mirror looks good, fits right in and looks o.e.m. quality, wiring seemed straight forward, only part of the mirror I didn't care much for, the green power on light stays on while the ignition is on, and it's kinda bright and annoying at night, I just covered mine with a piece of black tape, camera quality is good. It came with enough video cable to hook up in a Durango SUV, I was questioning whether it would be long enough, in fact, it was. I would recommend, and will most likely buy another one for my daughter car.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed. As noted in other reviews, the image is hard to see in the daylight. In darker conditions, the picture is very clear. Installation was pretty simple even though the instructions aren't too clear. Other reviews gave good instructions on installing, which I used. So far, so good. I'm very pleased with the mirror and camera.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got was defective and they let us return it and sent us a new one. This one works wonderfully. Haven't had any issues with it. I back into parking spots with ease and out of my toy and children filled driveway without an issue. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Southern

customer_reviews.title: I paid for professional installation and had no problems
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is very good. Production quality is very good; it looks like it could have come from the factory. I paid Best Buy $160 to install it. This was a very cost-effective way to get a back-up camera in a 2007 Toyota. No more bashing my bumper on stuff at night.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Can't see camera in daytime.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy and straight forward. Problem is I can't see the backup camera monitor in daylight as image is very dim and there is no way to adjust brightness. Possibly I have a defective unit. Anybody else with this issue? Maybe time to send back. Major disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Too short for f150, cannot mount the mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very faulty, wire was too short for my F150 and still can't mount the mirror on, we've tried 4 different people (all mechanics), and too much risk of cracking the tint and/or windshield and still no luck. Pretty upset
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -The LCD screen works. -build quality seems to be good. Cons: -The green power indicator LED is way too bright. It is especially distracting at night. had to put a piece of masking tape over it. -the mirror itself is too dark/not reflective enough. it's like have the anti-glare mode is always on, making it very hard to see what's behind you at night when there are no other cars behind you. When you are in reverse at night, the LCD is very bright, making it impossible to see anything in the other part of the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: J and Z

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 10 months, great at first.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great and was easy to install. Loved it until it stopped working a month ago. Not sure if it is the camera or the screen. It just flashes an image for a second now, and then shuts off. If i could determine if it was the camera and they were cheap enough would likely get another. I guess my return/warranty period was only one month?
customer_reviews.author: JW MILLER

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Night vision is excellent. Daylight presents a little glare, but a split-second re-focus on the video, instead of glare on mirror helps big time. Installation videos were helpful on YouTube. Extra electrical parts list was helpful on one of the Amazon reviews. Took a little longer because of difference in vehicles, but no real problems..
customer_reviews.author: Vsedinger

customer_reviews.title: it’s good product, l give 4 starts only because l ...
customer_reviews.text: it’s good product,l give 4 starts only because l think the screen on mirror that shows backup camera it’s small and the rca cable was not long enough to run from back to front on my 2002 ford f-250, l had to buy a extra cable and connection.
customer_reviews.author: jakson

customer_reviews.title: Camera works amazing! the mirror its self is a bit dark like it has a Tinted film on it
customer_reviews.text: I love the back up camera it's a great picture and everything but I don't like how dark the mirror is its self it's like it has a Tinted film on it it's very dark. But when I use the back up camera it's a beautiful color picture. I can still see put of the Tinted flim mirror i just had to get use to it. My Mechanic put in the system for me so I don't know if it was easy or not. It cost me $200 to have him Install it. Over all it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: Well I just opened the box and I bought it as a mew product and it is cleaely USED. The box had stickers markes off all over it and the protective film on the mirror was put back on it. Ill hook it up this wkend hopefully it works.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Benavides

customer_reviews.title: My husband can now safely back up our older truck without craning his neck.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a suggestion from my youngest son. He put it in for us and has also put one in his sister's minivan and his girlfriend's jeep. Seems to work really well and now my husband can safely back up without craning his neck!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Stecker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install if you mechanically inclined. Took about an hour to install. Great price and decent picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Will Coady

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a absolute horrible product. I ordered one and it was delivered broken so I had to order a replacement..... installed the replacement and the image would not show up on the camera..... so I ordered another replacement well 2 weeks later the image went out on this one also.DO NOT BUY! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Brown

customer_reviews.title: For the price I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit and I'm liking what I have. As others note, the power light is too bright at night. About equivalent to headlights in the mirror. Piece of tape solved that. Additionally, the mirror is a fixed dimness for headlights behind you. It doesn't dim at night and lighten during the day. The display brightness can be manually changed, but doesn't have an auto day night change. I bought it to allow me to hitch up my trailer without help. It does that well and for that I am pleased and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J G Williamson

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great. I upgraded the RCA cord before the install. the picture is really clear. This product is a great value. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Camera
customer_reviews.text: Mirror worked fine, camera did not. Camera flashed at first and just died, after trouble shooting set up a return for another camera. The faulty camera arrived in 4 days but I was told I'd have to wait 2 weeks for the replacement camera. Would give no starts if I could, the seller and Amazon handed the situation poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost button
customer_reviews.text: Button fell off mirror with in 2 days You get what you pay for !!
customer_reviews.author: The Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: This camera won’t blow your mind, yet for $64 I think it is a damn good deal. They don’t really give you instructions of how to install it cuz you can basically put it in on any vehicle. However, there’s a diagram, and if you are somehow handy and have a some tools and do a bit of research, you should be just fine. It took me nearly 2 hours to install it but I was in no rush. Picture quality is okay. I think it works better at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk when you need it most
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and easy installation. But the camera keeps fogging up on the inside so its useless on wet days when you need it most. Spend more money and get a better one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Super
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. Works as good as the factory one on my '12 Camaro worked. That one was also on the mirror. This one looks "factory" and works equally as well. This is by far the best choice I could've made. Thank you for this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watson

customer_reviews.title: Front to rear camera lead POOR size and quality leading to bad flicker.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat difficult to install, but more a problem of too many wires, long truck crew cab and wire routing wanted to protect wire from snagging on undergrowth encountered in 4wd operations.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Product.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this camera on my f150. It was really easy to install it only took about an hour from start to finish. For the price it can’t be beat. I’m really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value back up camera setup. Pretty easy to install. Unfortunately it would not fit on my Challeger due to the spacing and angle of the driver windshield. High quality product for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: T-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty good, the screen isn't very bright even on the brightest setting you can barely see it but for the price it's ok.🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Mike Relyea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The installation was good just that the back did not fut the rear view mirror holder for my 2011 Honda Civic. I had to take it to a winshield shop to have it fixed. But generally the reverse camera works just fine better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Shell  D

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy to install. I have a Ram 1500 crew cab with a standard bed. The wire to connect the camera to the harness was a bit too short to reach the firewall so i was forced to drill through the floor. Not optimal but it worked. The camera works as described. The picture is the slightest bit fuzzy but plenty clear enough. The night mode works fine. Less than an hour to install. In all, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allen

customer_reviews.title: Image wasn’t correct.
customer_reviews.text: Camera work fine but image wasn’t correct. Left and right.
customer_reviews.author: Kobe

customer_reviews.title: Great Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a a great backup camera. I have had one on my F150 for two years and it has worked flawlessly. Having the video screen is way better than having it in the dash like most new cars. My wife loved how the camera system works and had me install one on her F250. Makes hitching a trailer the easiest job in the world and is now a one person job.
customer_reviews.author: David Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install but the signal is terrible. The screen flicks to AV1 while driving down the road. It doesnt bother you during the day but at night it lights up your entire car. Also it will not shut off. When it was 1st installed you could change settings and cut the screen part off but now the button doesnt work. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: thomas martin

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great back up camera for the price. Had my mechanic install it. You can do it yourself. Take your time and patience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: great camera for the price, had some tech issues from install and customer service at amazon shipped out a new one free of charge. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Mirror shows through camera image
customer_reviews.text: Item is perfect at night. When using in daylight, the image ranges from OK to terrible. The determining factor is the direction of the sun. The problem is that the camera image does not overcome the mirror image. There is a way to brighten the image with the power button (which does not turn unit on or off) but no setting brings the camera into sharp focus. Heavy clouds and night time is where the unit shines.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Kawczynski

customer_reviews.title: Not for installation by a novice.
customer_reviews.text: After visiting several shops, I couldn’t hire anyone to install this for me. Wires must be spliced into existing backup lights. If you don’t have tools and knowledge this camera is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Perfect picture both night and day as well as inclement weather. Install in 2008 dodge ram quad cab. Only issue was having to add more wire for monitor and additional video cable to reach from monitor to camera. Would reccomend to anyone looking for quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't seem to like the truck. Hate the screen blinking at night.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a cop in back of you at night. It blinks when it gets dark.and this is worst than the first one. Not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk! Wish I could get my money back but both worth the time and hassle. I washed my truck a few weeks after installing it. Never sprayed it directly with water and guess what happened? Camera stopped working. P.O.S.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks the glare on the mirror won't let me see when I'm backing up I was going to return it but I went out on a business trip I did not have a chance to do so.... I asked for a replacement to try out a second time it sucked too so now I'm stuck with 2 of this things ...do not buy this product not worth your money

customer_reviews.title: Rearview mirror for a Jeep Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Read before purchase
customer_reviews.text: On the third camera in under a year of use. Overall it’s a good value. However I’m not impressed with the customer support. So be aware of what your purchasing when you do and I hope you have the know how to replace the camera when it fails.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installing the system on my Wrangler, selected a location on the bumper to take advantage of the location. Need to purchase windshield adhesive, watch the videos' online they are helpful.

customer_reviews.title: A must for a large truck or SUV.

I would get this one if in the market for one.
